SELECT IFNULL(dl.user_id,'') user_id, IFNULL(dl.print_lottery_refund_amount,'') print_lottery_refund_amount, IFNULL(dl.money_paid,'') money_paid, IFNULL(dl.ticket_amount,'') ticket_amount, IFNULL(dl.surplus,'') surplus, IFNULL(dl.user_surplus,'') user_surplus, IFNULL(dl.user_surplus_limit,'') user_surplus_limit, IFNULL(dl.third_party_paid,'') third_party_paid, IFNULL(dl.give_integral,'') give_integral, IFNULL(dl.order_from,'') order_from, IFNULL(dl.pay_time,'') pay_time, IFNULL(dl.winning_money,'') winning_money, IFNULL(dl.bet_num,'') bet_num, IFNULL(dl.cathectic,'') cathectic, IFNULL(dl.accept_time,'') accept_time, IFNULL(dl.forecast_money,'') forecast_money, IFNULL(dl.issue,'') issue, IFNULL(dl.ticket_num,'') ticket_num, IFNULL(dl.award_time,'') award_time, IFNULL(dl.merchant_no,'') merchant_no, IFNULL(dl.mobile,'') mobile, IFNULL(dl.merchant_order_sn,'') merchant_order_sn, IFNULL(dlc.lottery_name,'') lottery_name, IFNULL(dlc.lottery_img,'') lottery_img, (select name from dl_store where phone=log.phone) as store_name, log.op_type print_lottery_status, IFNULL(log.fail_msg,'') fail_msg, IFNULL(log.add_time,'') ticket_time, IFNULL(log.phone,'') store_id,
FROM dl_order dl left join dl_lottery_classify dlc on dl.lottery_classify_id=dlc.lottery_classify_id left join dl_log_operation log on dl.order_sn=log.order_sn WHERE log.type=2 and dl.order_id=#{orderno }

select dl.order_id, dl.order_sn, dl.parent_sn, dl.user_id, dl.pay_status, dl.pay_id, dl.pay_code, dl.pay_name, dl.pay_sn, dl.money_paid, dl.ticket_amount, dl.surplus, dl.user_surplus, dl.user_surplus_limit, dl.third_party_paid, dl.user_bonus_id, dl.bonus, dl.give_integral, dl.order_from, dl.add_time, dl.pay_time, dl.order_type, dl.lottery_classify_id, dl.lottery_play_classify_id, dl.match_time, dl.winning_money, dl.pass_type, dl.play_type, dl.cathectic, dl.bet_num, dl.forecast_money, dl.is_delete, dl.device_channel, dl.issue, dl.max_level, dl.accept_time, dl.check_remark, dl.order_status, log.op_type print_lottery_status, IFNULL(log.fail_msg,'') fail_msg, IFNULL(log.add_time,'') ticket_time, IFNULL(log.phone,'') store_id, (select name from dl_store where phone=log.phone) as store_name from dl_order dl left join dl_log_operation log on dl.order_sn=log.order_sn WHERE log.type=2 and dl.order_sn = #{orderSn}

select IFNULL(dod.match_id,'') matchId, IFNULL(dod.changci,'') changci, IFNULL(dod.match_team,'') matchTeam, IFNULL(dod.match_result,'') matchResult, IFNULL(dod.ticket_data,'') ticketData, IFNULL(dod.ticket_status,'') ticketStatus, IFNULL(dod.give_integral,'') giveIntegral, IFNULL(dod.lottery_classify_id,'') lotteryClassifyId, IFNULL(dod.lottery_play_classify_id,'') lotteryPlayClassifyId, IFNULL(dod.is_guess,'') isGuess, IFNULL(dod.add_time,'') addTime, IFNULL(dod.is_dan,'') isDan, IFNULL(dod.match_time,'') matchTime, IFNULL(dod.fix_odds,'') fixedodds, IFNULL(dod.issue,'') issue, IFNULL(dod.lottery_play_classify_id,'') playType, IFNULL(dod.bet_type,'') betType from dl_order_detail dod where dod.order_id = #{orderId}
select status status, redirect_url redirectUrl from dl_lottery_play_classify where lottery_classify_id=#{classifyId} and lottery_play_classify_id=#{playClassifyId}
select play_type playType, play_name playName from dl_lottery_play_classify where lottery_classify_id=#{lotteryClassifyId}
select lottery_name lotteryName, lottery_img lotteryImg from dl_lottery_classify where lottery_classify_id=#{classifyId}
